msbt.message: Pretty tidy in here, ain't it? Yeah it's not usually like this.
OK, I forgot to vacuum. Sorry, I'm not the busybody-host type. Just don't go hunting for dust piles, OK?
Next time you're here, I think I'm gonna try out some new recipes on you. Sound good?Umwhat's with that face?
My place rocks, right? I know it does! And you're welcome to chill here any time you like.
If you ever need someone to hear out your troubles, or even a shoulder to cry on, just let me know! My life's been a wild ride. I'm sure I've learned something that can help you, !
Seeing everyone together like this reminds me of the old days, and old friends. Feels good, .
Sowe've got , , and me. A trio of troublemakers, eh?Y'know, I never thought I'd see the day I had a crew like this again, .
The time just felt right for a big-time hangout, y'know? So we gonna get rowdy or what, ?
It's kind of a rush having everyone over like this, . I love it!
Why'd everybody wanna hang out here, anyway? My place is soooo dull! Not complaining, just
I love having guests over. The more the merrier, I say! Shame I wasn't able to buy snacks though
